choices: The Kingdom of Arvinia
The Kingdom of Mountania
The Kingdom of Fantasia
The Kingdom of Salacia
1.content:
Where will you go?

Arvinia, where gluttony, obesity, weight-gain and hedonism abound?

Mountania, where strength, good looks, and raw power dominate?

Fantasia, where magic and wonder pervade the air and the land beneath it?

Salacia, where sexual pleasure and kinky fetishes are the order of the day...every day of the week?
1.title: Selecting a Kingdom!

choices: King Chandler in his throne room, receiving audiences from his courtiers.
Queen Regina in the Palace drawing room, eating lunch with her friends.
The princes in their private suite, being waited on hand & foot by servant-boys.
Princes Tiberius & Taurus, the fat princes' bodyguards and closest friends.
The Fat Princes' servant-boys, obediently attending their masters' every need.
11.content:
You have chosen the cheerful, and chubby, Kingdom of Arvinia, where third helpings are encouraged, and fourths are never enough! Green rolling hills spread across the land, and fields of wheat shimmer in the sunlight. Cattle graze on the lush green grass, and everywhere, the smell of cooking pervades the summery air.

But who are you, and where are you, and what is your role here?
11.title: The Kingdom of Arvinia

choices: Roland, the chocolatier's son, takes the two other caskets to the fat princes.
Reginald takes the final casket of chocolates to the queen.
After his chocolates, the king decides to attend market day in the city.
Crown Prince Cyrus and his son Prince Orion, have dropped by for a visit!
111.content:
"Who's next, Bradley?"

"Reginald and his son Roland, your Majesty".

"Ah! Yes...very well. Send them in!"

"Majesty".

Bradley waddled down the red and blue runner carpet, away from the gigantic, royal dais and beckoned to a sentry outside. He waved a wooden staff and two figures entered the throne room, both dressed in white. They waddled up the aisle and stopped at the bottom of the enormous, gleaming, ivory cream-coloured dais of polished stone. They knelt and bowed their heads.

"You are my last audience of the day", said the king, sweeping his blonde hair back from around his eyes. "Isn't that so, Brad?"

"Uh..." the king's manservant fumbled with a sheet of parchment in his hands, "Um...yes sir! Last one for the day, sir!"

"Excellent! So let's make this quick, shall we? What is it that you're here for?"

"Majesty! We come bearing our monthly samplers, your Majesty", said Reginald, a very fat man with light brown hair, wearing a white uniform and cap. It was here that the king noticed, the man was carrying elaborately carved wooden boxes in his hands.

"Ah! Excellent! I've been waiting for these! Put them down, Reggie! They must be heavy!"

"Each casket is four pounds of my finest, your Majesty".

The king laughed!

"My goodness! Well, your labours will certainly be rewarded by my appreciation! You may leave this here..."

The king tapped the uppermost casket with his walking-stick. "And take the second to the Queen...now young Roland..."

Roland waddled forwards. He was a stout, ten-year-old youth with a full, round belly. He weighed a solid 250 pounds and had darker brown hair, like his mother.

"You will take these two caskets..."

The king pointed to the last two wooden boxes.

"...to the Princes' Suite. I'm sure they'll be waiting over eagerly for them!"

"Yes, Majesty!" said the boy at once, his chubby face breaking out into smiles.

The king smirked, "I thought so! Go on, boy! But don't rush! Don't want you breaking anything!"

"No, Majesty! Yes, Majesty!"

Bradley chuckled as the boy bent over, picked up the two wooden boxes, bowed, and waddled out of the throne room.

"A fine boy you've got there, Reggie", he said. Reginald smiled.

"Yes! He's taking after his father, and he has excellent skills at the craft!"

"Absolutely", said the king. "You must be very proud! He is following a noble profession!".

Reginald blushed, "Indeed, Majesty".

The king chuckled. "Now!...Let's see what's inside here, shall we?"

Chandler opened the wooden casket and a rich, tantalizing smell wafted forth.

"Four pounds of your finest chocolates, eh, Reginald? Excellent...come along, Brad, help yourself..."
111.title: The King on his Throne

choices: Tiberius & Taurus go for a swim. They meet the fat princes playing in the water
Taurus has a cut on his arm. He goes to the palace infirmary to get it treated.
The mountain princes get dressed to accompany the fat princes to market.
The mountain princes run into their friend, the Wizard Prince Orion, visiting.
They hear a crunching noise!...Cameron has broken a couch...again.
114.content:
Sparks showered through the air as steel crashed against steel! A sickening screeching, grinding noise!

"No, no, no, no, no!! Break OFF! Parry! Step BACK! You're not DANCING with him! You're supposed to be sparring with him!"

"S-sorry pops!"

Two tall, burly-looking youths, stunningly handsome and beautifully youthful, lowered their swords to the ground.

Prince Bastion moved between his two sons, disarming them.

"Alright, I think that's enough for today", he said. "Tiber, your footwork needs improving!"

"Pa! My footwork is FINE! Besides, I wouldn't have to keep hopping around so much if Taurus wasn't so leadfooted himself!"

"Oh shut up!"

"Alright! That's enough!" said a tall, beautiful blonde creature with curves that went on for months. She trotted into the room and gave her husband a kiss. "My darling! You shouldn't push them so!"

"Oh rubbish, they enjoy it!" said Bastion, firmly. The Mountain Prince was tall, tanned, with thick, dark brown hair and deep green eyes. He smiled at his two sons.

"Did you send that letter off to your cousin?"

"Sure we did, pops, but Gabriel won't get it for another week!" said Tiberius. "C'mon, let's leave the LOVEBIRDS to their kissing..."

Princess Elvina smiled and draped her arms around her strong, hulking husband. "I do think our sons are getting a bit...embarrassed, my darling..."

"Oh? Well perhaps we should see what we can do about that..."

"EEWWWWW!!!"

Bastion's deep, booming laugh rippled through the enormous gym and fencing-room inside the gigantic royal palace in the heart of the Adiposian capital of Regis City.
114.title: Princes Tiberius & Taurus, the fat princes'...

choices: The princes visit a high-end jeweler to buy more gold and jewels for themselves.
The Princes visit the Central Market, to sample all the food on offer!
The princes visit the Royal Charity Orphanage, and help to feed hungry children.
The princes are spotted by one of their friends at the market.
The princes have to attend their monthly, ceremonial public weigh-ins.
1143.content:
"C'mon, bro", said Tiberius, "Cameron said they wanted to go out before lunch to check out the market".

"OK!" said his brother, and the two mountain princes rushed off to their own suite to change out of their fencing-garb into their tunic, hose, and ceremonial breastplates, complete with helmets and swords. After doing up the leather straps and buckles that held their armour on, the two handsome young princes shuffled down the corridor to another suite, where the fat princes were being prepared for their outing.

"That's your shoes done, Master!"

"Thanks Mason!"

"And here's your stick, Master!"

"Thanks Maxy...alright, I think I'm ready!"

"Just a minute!"

Mason shuffled forwards. He carried a bright blue and red silken cloak that he draped over Prince Cameron's chubby shoulders, and which he clipped together at the front.

"Now you're ready!" he said.

"You guys set to go?" Taurus asked. He walked over and jabbed the immensely fat royal prince with the pommel of his short-sword. "C'mon, Prince Tub-a-Lard! Get waddlin'!" he teased.

"Oh shut up!" said Cameron, "Eddie hurry up!"

"I'm comin'!" said Eddie, and Prince Edmund waddled out of his bedroom. Like his brother, he was dressed in leather slippers, a silken cloak and a soft, woolen cap in red and blue, and carried a stout, silver-topped walking-stick. Neither prince was slim enough to require anything else to 'cover' themselves up, and were used to going out like this...especially in the summertime.

Soon, Cameron, his two servant-boys Mason and Max, and his brother Edmund, and his two servants, Wilbur and Samson, were all ready to go. A carriage parked outside the palace entrance would drive them into town, with Tiberius and Taurus riding along on the back.

"You boys be careful out there!" said their father, when he spotted them waddling past the throne-room door.

"Yes papa!" said Edmund, "C'mon Cameron, or we'll be late!"
1143.title: Armed Guards.

choices: The princes hop out and waddle around the market with their friends and servants
The princes give alms to the homeless children and let them touch their bellies.
A boy who is a die-hard fan of the fat princes can't wait to try and meet them!
A boy who is a die-hard fan of the muscle princes can't wait to meet them!
The princes visit a friend who lives near the main square.
11432.content:
"Where to, young masters?" asked a fat, well-fed man in a bright red uniform.

"Hey Portly! We're going to the market!" said Prince Cameron.

"Right you are!" said the princes' private coachman, "Hop in!"

He smiled as the princes waddled in, with Tiberius and Taurus following after them, along with their servant-boys.

"Why are you going into town on market day when you can eat whatever you want at home?' Taurus asked, prodding Camberon's enormous belly with the point of his dagger.

"S-stop it!" Cameron gasped, and giggled! The steel was cold and ticklish!

"It's part of our royal duties!" said Edmund, smugly, "It's good for the peasantry to see us mingling among them!"

"Or AROUND them..." said Tiberius, rubbing Edmund's own massive belly. The prince blushed.

"Such is the weight of royalty!" said Cameron, smirking. The muscle princes rolled their eyes.

As the carriage rumbled into town, the princes pulled down the folding roof and lowered the windows on their carriage so that they could look out, and be seen to look out, and wave to everybody. They were approaching the main market square and they could smell smoke and roasting meat, fresh bread and sizzling oil! Cameron's belly gurgled hungrily!
11432.title: The Princes visit the Central Market, to sample...

choices: King Albion, enjoying a vigorous training session with his troops.
Queen Lucille, having an arm wrestling match with her younger sons.
Crown Prince Gabriel, off on a hunting trip with friends.
Princes Tiberius and Taurus, trying to arm wrestle mom together.
Princess Sophia, pumping iron and getting ready to arm wrestle mom.
12.content: You've chosen Mountainia, kingdom of strength and military power.In this land, might is right, but who are you?
12.title: The Kingdom of Mountania

info.brief_description: Obesity & Gluttony, Beauty & Brawn, Magic & Wonder, Casual Sex & Kinks. 4 Great Kingdoms!
info.description:
Separated from each other by great rivers, vast mountain ranges, and enormous, valleys and fjords, the four great kingdoms have coexisted peacefully since the very dawn of time. But which kingdom is right for you?

Setting: The Four Kingdoms exist in a High Medieval-Renaissance Fantasy setting, roughly equivalent to 1300AD - 1600AD.

The Kingdom of Arvinia - Greed, gluttony, hedonism, obesity and weight-gain! For the average Arvinian, too much is never enough, and the creed of this ancient and prosperous kingdom is Gula et Voluptatum - Gluttony & Hedonsim! Everybody from the smallest child to the largest of full-grown adults embrace a culture of feeding, gaining, obesity and good living, the likes of which the other kingdoms have rarely imagined. Rivers and vast farmlands allow for abundant and limitless foods and drinks for all! Arvinians of all ages range from plump, to chubby, to obese, to virtually immobile, but men are generally taller than women.

Ruling Family: The Ancient and Immense House of Regia.
King Chandler the Immense. 8,000lbs. 7'0". 30 years old. Blonde hair, blue eyes.
Queen Regina. 5,000lbs. 5'9". 28 years old. Brown hair, brown eyes.
Crown Prince Cameron. 1,500lbs. 5'6". 12 years old. Blonde hair, blue eyes.
Prince Edmund. 1,300lbs. 5'6". 12 years old. Brown hair, green eyes.

The Kingdom of Mountania - Strength, warfare, industry and great craftsmanship, Mountania prides itself on its fine woodworking, stonemasonry, jewelry and mining. Mountanians stand tall and proud - both literally and figuratively. The tallest, strongest and most bulked-out of all the citizenry of the Four Kingdoms, Mountania provides much of the military protection for its noble and proud neighbours, in return for trading rights and special concessions. Mountain men and boys are much taller and heavier than average men and boys in other countries.

Ruling Family: The Royal House of Vuurden.
King Albion the Great. 3,000lbs. 7'6". 30 years old. Brown hair, brown eyes.
Queen Lucille. 170lbs. 5'9". 28 years old. Blonde hair, blue eyes.
Crown Prince Gabriel. 500lbs. 6'9". 15 years old. Golden-brown hair, brown eyes.
Princess Sophia. 100lbs. 5ft tall. 10 years old. Blonde hair, blue eyes.

~~~ ~~~ ~~~ ~~~

Prince Bastion. 7'6". 28 years old. Brown hair, brown eyes.
Princess Elvina. 6'3". 27 years old. Blonde hair. Blue eyes.
Prince Tiberius. 300lbs. 6ft tall. 12 years old. Blonde hair, blue eyes.
Prince Taurus. 280lbs. 6ft tall. 12 years old. Golden-brown hair, brown eyes.

Prince Bastion, his wife Princess Elvina, and their two sons, live in the Arvinian royal palace, as Mountanian ambassadors to the Kingdom of Adiposia. They are close friends with the Arvinian royal family.


The Kingdom of Fantasia - Magic and wonderment, spellcasting and alchemy, Fantasia prides itself on its mastery of the mystic arts. Spells, potions, enchanted and magical objects, magical creatures, magical experimentation, and the recording of knowledge are all highly regarded in Fantasia!

Ruling Family: The Ancient House of Albreon.
King Zelthran the Magnificent. 250lbs. 6'9", 50 years old. White hair, green eyes.
Crown Prince Cyrus. 200lbs. 6'. 30 years old. Brown hair, green eyes.
Prince Orion. 350lbs. 5'6". 12 years old. Light brown hair, green eyes.

The Kingdom of Salacia - Much like Arvinia, Salacia is a land of shameless excesses and hedonism. Whereas Arvinia concentrates on the pleasures of food, drink, gluttony and obesity, Salacia is all about more...earthly pleasures. Sexual hedonism, fetishistic pleasures and all kinds of kinks and perversions reign supreme! Almost anything goes, and almost nothing is too taboo! Casual sex and teenage pregnancies are so common as to be almost non-entities!

Ruling Family: The Seductive House of Maxima
King Thorus the Great. 4,000lbs. 7'6". 32 years old. Golden-brown hair, brown eyes.
Queen Susanna. 250lbs. 6'9". 28 years old. Golden blonde hair, blue eyes.
Crown Prince Thorwald. 200lbs. 6'3". 16 years old. Golden-brown hair, brown eyes.
